code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(email&&password){localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify({email}));navigate('/profiles');}else{alert('Please fill in both fields');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",required:true,value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email or phone number"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",required:true,value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-help",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"remember-me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"remember-me",children:"Remember me"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:"Need help?"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["New to Netflix? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Sign up now"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{children:["This page is protected by Google reCAPTCHA to ensure you're not a bot.",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:"Learn more."})]})]})});};export default Login;
